New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [1,165pts]

  • **Pitched Battle GHB 2021** 2,000 (Chaos - Slaves to Darkness) [1,165pts]

    • Leader [340pts]

      • Chaos Lord on Karkadrak [225pts]

        Selections: 4. Eternal Vendetta, 6. Realmwarper’s Twist-rune, Battering Tail, Chaos Runeshield, Daemonbound Blade, General, Hexed Battle-axe, Nurgle, Tearing Horn and Claws

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, HERO, EYE OF THE GODS, MARK OF CHAOS, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader, NURGLE, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Realmwarper’s Twist-rune, Command Abilities: The Knights of Chaos, Command Trait: Eternal Vendetta, Unit: Chaos Lord on Karkadrak, Unit Abilities: Aura of Nurgle (HERO, Allegiance: Slaves to Darkness), Brutish Rampage, Chaos Runeshield, Daemonbound, Fuelled by Carnage, Weapon: Battering Tail, Daemonbound Blade, Hexed Battle-axe, Tearing Horn and Claws


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Realmwarper’s Twist-rune Friendly DESPOILERS units wholly within 12" of the bearer are unaffected by the Pitch-black and Nightmare Chasm scenery rules.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        The Knights of Chaos You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly CHAOS KNIGHTS, CHAOS CHARIOTS or GOREBEAST CHARIOTS unit wholly within 18" of a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for that unit and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Eternal Vendetta You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by this general. In addition, you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this general that target ORDER units.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Lord on Karkadrak 9"983+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Nurgle (HERO, Allegiance: Slaves to Darkness) If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE unit wholly within 12" of any friendly models with this ability is 6, add 1 to the damage inflicted by that attack. In addition, if this model is a general, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Brutish Rampage Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model makes a charge move. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Chaos Runeshield Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.
        Daemonbound If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Daemonbound Blade is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Fuelled by Carnage At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s Hexed Battle-axe in that phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Battering Tail Melee1"24+4+-1
        Daemonbound Blade Melee1"33+3+-1D3
        Hexed Battle-axe Melee1"53+3+-2

      • Chaos Sorcerer Lord [115pts]

        Selections: 6. Master of Deception, Arcane Bolt, Chaos Runeblade, Daemonic Power, General, Mystic Shield, Nurgle, Sorcerer Staff

        Categories: CHAOS, CHAOS SORCERER LORD, HERO, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, WIZARD, EYE OF THE GODS, MARK OF CHAOS, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, NURGLE, General

        Command Trait: Master of Deception, Magic: Chaos Sorcerer Lord, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Daemonic Power, Mystic Shield, Unit: Chaos Sorcerer Lord, Unit Abilities: Aura of Nurgle (HERO, Allegiance: Slaves to Darkness), Oracular Visions, Weapon: Chaos Runesword, Sorcerer Staff


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Master of Deception Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this general.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Chaos Sorcerer Lord 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Daemonic Power
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Daemonic Power 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly MORTAL SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. You can re-roll hit and wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Sorcerer Lord 5"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref

In addition, if this model is a general, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Oracular Visions In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly MORTAL SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within 12" of this unit. If you do so, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

    • Behemoth [185pts]

      • Chaos Warshrine [185pts]

        Selections: Bless, Flailing Fists, Nurgle, Sacrificial Blade, Smite

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, TOTEM, PRIEST, CHAOS WARSHRINE, MARK OF CHAOS, Behemoth, NURGLE

        Damage Table: Chaos Warshrine, Chaos Warshrine1, Chaos Warshrine2, Chaos Warshrine3, Chaos Warshrine4, Chaos Warshrine5, Prayer: Bless, Favour of Chaos, Favour of Khorne, Favour of Nurgle, Favour of Slaanesh, Favour of Tzeentch, Smite, Unit: Chaos Warshrine, Unit Abilities: Favour of the Ruinous Powers, Protection of the Dark Gods, Weapon: Flailing Fists, Sacrificial Blade


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref

        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Bless 412"Pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit has a ward of 6+.
        Favour of Chaos 318"If answered, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS MORTAL unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. You can re-roll hit and wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, if that unit has the UNDIVIDED keyword, you can re-roll charge rolls for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Favour of Khorne 318"If answered, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS MORTAL unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. You can re-roll charge rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, if that unit has the KHORNE keyword, you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Favour of Nurgle 318"If answered, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS MORTAL unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, if that unit has the NURGLE keyword, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Favour of Slaanesh 318"If answered, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS MORTAL unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. You can re-roll charge rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, if that unit has the SLAANESH keyword, do not take battleshock tests for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Favour of Tzeentch 318"If answered, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS MORTAL unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. You can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, if that unit has the TZEENTCH keyword, until your next hero phase, you can roll a dice each time that unit is affected by a spell or the abilities of an endless spell. If you do so, on a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell or the abilities of that endless spell on that unit.
        Smite 248"Pick 1 enemy Priest within range and visible to the chanter. That enemy Priest suffers 1 mortal wound. If the chanting roll was 6 or more, that enemy Priest suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Warshrine *1274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Favour of the Ruinous Powers At the start your hero phase, you can say that this model will chant one of the following prayers. If you do so, pick 1 friendly MORTAL SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within 18" of this model and make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+, the prayer is answered. The same unit cannot benefit from the same prayer more than once per turn.
        Protection of the Dark Gods Friendly MORTAL SLAVES TO DARKNESS units that are wholly within range of this unit’s Protection of the Dark Gods ability, as shown on the damage table above, have a ward of 6+.

    • Battleline [640pts]

      • Chaos Knights [170pts]

        Selections: 5 Chaos Knights [170pts], Chaos Runeshields, Trampling Hooves

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, CHAOS KNIGHTS, Battleline

        Unit: Chaos Knights, Unit Abilities: Chaos Runeshield, Doom Knight, Terrifying Champions, Weapon: Trampling Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Knights 10"374+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Runeshield Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to a unit with Chaos Runeshields. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.
        Doom Knight 1 model in this unit can be a Doom Knight. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic that model’s melee weapons (excluding its mount). In addition, that model can replace its weapon option with a Cursed Flail and Chaos Runeshield.
        Terrifying Champions Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units within 3" of any friendly units with this ability in the battleshock phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Trampling Hooves Melee1"24+4+-1

      • Chaos Marauders [180pts]

        Selections: 20 Chaos Marauders [90pts], Barbarian Flails, Drummer, Icon Bearer, Nurgle, Reinforced [90pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, CHAOS MARAUDERS, Battleline, Reinforced, NURGLE

        Unit: Chaos Marauders, Unit Abilities: Barbarian Hordes, Boundless Ferocity, Drummer, Icon Bearer, Marauder Chieftain, Weapon: Barbarian Flail


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Marauders 6"156+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Barbarian Hordes Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit while it has at least 10 models. In addition, improve the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons by 1 while it has at least 20 models.
        Boundless Ferocity When you make a charge roll for this unit, change the lowest dice in that roll to a 6. If the roll is a double, change one of the dice to a 6 instead.
        Drummer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Barbarian Drummer. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Barbarian Drummers.
        Icon Bearer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of any friendly Icon Bearers.
        Marauder Chieftain 1 model in this unit can be a Marauder Chieftain. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Barbarian Flail Melee2"14+3+-1

      • Chaos Marauders [90pts]

        Darkwood Shields Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target a unit with Darkwood Shields.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Slaves to Darkness

          Selections: Ravagers

          Aura of Chaos Power: Aura of Chaos Undivided, Aura of Khorne, Aura of Nurgle, Aura of Slaanesh, Aura of Tzeentch, Battle Trait: Aura of Chaos, Eye of the Gods, Glory for the Taking, Command Abilities: Rally the Tribes, Eye of the Gods - 2D6 roll: 02 - Spawndom, 03 - Slaughterer's Strength, 04 - Murderous Mutation, 05 - Iron Flesh, 06 - Flames of Chaos, 07 - Snubbed by the Gods, 08 - Unholy Resilience, 09-10 - Daemonic Legions, 11-12 - Dark Apotheosis


        Aura of Chaos Power Ability Ref
        Aura of Chaos Undivided Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS UNDIVIDED units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS UNDIVIDED unit wholly within 12" of this model. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Aura of Khorne You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS KHORNE units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS KHORNE units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Aura of Nurgle If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE unit wholly within 12" of any friendly models with this ability is 6, add 1 to the damage inflicted by that attack. In addition, if this model is a general, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Aura of Slaanesh If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH unit wholly within 12" of this model is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. In addition, if this model is a general, you can re-roll run and charge rolls for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Aura of Tzeentch You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, each time a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH unit wholly within 12" of this model is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 5+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Aura of Chaos If a SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO has a Mark of Chaos keyword, that HERO has one of the following Aura of Chaos abilities. The Aura of Chaos a HERO has is determined by its Mark of Chaos keyword: KHORNE HEROES have the Aura of Khorne, TZEENTCH HEROES have the Aura of Tzeentch, NURGLE HEROES have the Aura of Nurgle, SLAANESH HEROES have the Aura of Slaanesh, and UNDIVIDED HEROES have the Aura of Chaos Undivided.

        If you select a unit with more than one Mark of Chaos keyword to be part of your army, you must pick which one will apply to that unit for the duration of the battle.
        Eye of the Gods At the end of the combat phase, if any attacks made by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO that has the EYE OF THE GODS keyword destroyed any enemy HEROES or MONSTERS in that phase, you can make 1 roll on the Eye of the Gods table below for that friendly HERO.

        Rewards gained by rolling on this table apply for the rest of the battle. Duplicate rewards are treated as ‘Snubbed by the Gods’ instead
        Glory for the Taking If your general is not a DAEMON PRINCE, you can pick 1 command trait for up to 5 different friendly RAVAGERS HEROES (excluding DAEMON PRINCES) in addition to the command trait your general can have. You must pick a different command trait for each of these HEROES, and none of them can have more than 1 command trait. You can use these command traits for these HEROES even though they are not your general.

        At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly RAVAGERS HERO (excluding DAEMON PRINCES) that is on the battlefield and has a command trait to stake their claim as warlord. If you do so, that HERO becomes the army general until your next hero phase.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Rally the Tribes You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick the model that is currently your general. The same model cannot be picked more than once per battle. That model rallies 1 unit of 10 CHAOS MARAUDERS, 1 unit of 5 CHAOS MARAUDER HORSEMEN or 1 CULTISTS unit of up to 10 models to the battlefield. The unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Eye of the Gods - 2D6 roll Reward Ref
        02 - Spawndom You can add 1 SLAVES TO DARKNESS CHAOS SPAWN to your army. If you do so, set up 1 SLAVES TO DARKNESS CHAOS SPAWN model within 1" of this HERO, then this HERO is slain. If you do not add a SLAVES TO DARKNESS CHAOS SPAWN to your army, this HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        03 - Slaughterer's Strength Pick 1 of this HERO’s melee weapons. Improve the Rend characteristic of that weapon by 1.
        04 - Murderous Mutation Pick 1 of this HERO’s melee weapons. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon.
        05 - Iron Flesh Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this HERO.
        06 - Flames of Chaos Each time this HERO is affected by a spell or endless spell you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on this HERO.
        07 - Snubbed by the Gods This reward has no effect.
        08 - Unholy Resilience Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this HERO. On a 5+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        09-10 - Daemonic Legions You can add 1 of the following units to your army. The unit you add is determined by this HERO’s Mark of Chaos. Set up the unit wholly within 12" of this HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        • Khorne: 10 Bloodletters
        • Nurgle: 10 Plaguebearers
        • Slaanesh: 10 Daemonettes
        • Tzeentch: 10 Pink Horrors
        • Undivided: 6 Furies
        11-12 - Dark Apotheosis You can add a SLAVES TO DARKNESS DAEMON PRINCE to your army. If you do so, set it up within 1" of this HERO then remove this HERO from play (they do not count as slain).

        If the HERO had the UNDIVIDED keyword, the DAEMON PRINCE must instead have one of the following Mark of Chaos keywords: KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH or TZEENTCH. Otherwise, the DAEMON PRINCE must have the same Mark of Chaos keyword that the HERO had.

        The DAEMON PRINCE keeps any command traits and artefacts of power that the HERO had. If the HERO was a WIZARD, the DAEMON PRINCE is a WIZARD, can make the same number of casting, dispelling and unbinding attempts, and knows the same spells. If the HERO was your general, the DAEMON PRINCE is now your general.

        If you do not set up a SLAVES TO DARKNESS DAEMON PRINCE, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this HERO.
